title: Explain conversational follow-up
description: Describe how RN handles follow-up questions in a dialogue format as highlighted on the introduction page.

title: List limitations of RN
description: Identify the key limitations of RN mentioned (such as plausible-but-incorrect answers, sensitivity to prompt phrasing) from the overview page. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

title: Describe training methodology
description: Explain the training method used for RN, including supervised fine-tuning and reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF). :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

title: Summarise the deployment strategy
description: Summarise the iterative deployment approach used by OpenAI when releasing RN (learning from prior model deployments). :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

title: Provide sample user-assistant interactions
description: Give three example prompts and responses that represent how RN interacts with users, as shown on the landing page.

title: Define relationship to InstructGPT
description: Explain how RN is described in relation to InstructGPT (its sibling model) in the introduction. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

title: Identify safety & moderation mechanisms
description: List and describe the safety, moderation, or filtering mechanisms mentioned in the RN overview. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}

title: Describe user-feedback process
description: Explain the kind of feedback that OpenAI is requesting from users of RN (e.g., for improving the model). :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

title: Outline major headings & contents
description: List the major headings on the RN overview page (Methods, Limitations, Iterative deployment etc.) and summarise what each section covers. :contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}

title: Provide use-cases and sample prompts
